attributes.action: Instruct the relevant Government parties to recognise The Royal Observer Corps with full Veteran status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the under signed petition the UK 
Prime Minister to instruct the relevant Government parties to hereby give full recognition of Service to The Royal Observer Corps (Association onwards-1991)former members & their families who did serve between formation of
the Observer Corps 1925 until 
'Stand Down' 1991 & those who did serve onwards until 1993 the full honour of
'Veteran' status & the rights to wear the current Armed Forces Veterans badge
in recognition of service to Crown & Country.
